title: 5 Ways Static Code Analysis Can Improve Developer Experience
description: Developer experience is not only about nice editors and fast build times. It is about reducing friction so developers can focus on solving problems rather than fighting with tools. Among the most effective developer experience tools available today is static code analysis. By examining code without running it, static analysis surfaces potential issues early and [â€¦]

description:

There were no tool changes as of the date of the registry release in August, though more changes will be listed in the next release in September. Some stats [â€¦]

title: Improved Annotation Handling in Kotlin 2.2: Less Boilerplate, Fewer SurprisesÂ
description: Many developers have run into subtle issues with annotations when working with Kotlin and frameworks like Spring or JPA-based persistence frameworks. For instance, an annotation applied to a constructor parameter might not always end up in the property or backing field where the framework expects it. This often means annotations donâ€™t land where theyâ€™re needed. [â€¦]
